about.title: About Micropeptide Group
about.subtitle: Science-driven innovation, creating next-generation functional skincare brands
about.description: Micropeptide Group leverages biotechnology and dermatological research to develop highly active, stable bioactive ingredients for internationally competitive functional skincare brands. Our integrated approach combines research excellence, industrial collaboration, and standardized implementation across the complete value chain from basic research to commercial application.

team.title: Leadership Team

research.subtitle: Strategic partnerships with leading universities, establishing comprehensive R&D infrastructure and technology platforms

southern.name: Southern Medical University
southern.description: Specialized in transdermal delivery, nano-encapsulation, and natural ingredient development; 56+ patents with partnerships including CR999, Danzi, Bawang, and HBN

anhui.name: Anhui Medical University
anhui.description: Joint key laboratory developing highly active, stable bioactive ingredients (recombinant collagen type III, metallothionein), replacing traditional animal-derived extracts

sanya.name: Sanya Research Consortium
sanya.description: Collaborative research since 2022 focusing on medical aesthetics industry advancement, delivering personalized skincare solutions with emphasis on clinical validation and industry development

card1.alt: Micropeptide Bio Strategic Partnership with Southern Medical University
card1.title: Micropeptide Bio Establishes Strategic Research Alliance with Southern Medical University
card1.description: Comprehensive collaboration in dermatological research and efficacy validation, advancing integrated industry-academia-research development initiatives.

card2.alt: New Class 100,000 GMPC Manufacturing Facility Operational
card2.title: State-of-the-Art Class 100,000 GMPC Manufacturing Facility Now Operational
card2.description: Advanced automated production lines achieve full operational capacity with 1M+ daily production capability, significantly enhancing supply chain reliability.
